程序包 gameplay

类 GameEngine

java.lang.Object
gameplay.GameEngine
public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
this is game main controller

  • 字段概要

    字段 
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    GameData d_GameData
    the GameData you design from the MainLoop

  • 构造器概要

    构造器 
    构造器 说明
    GameEngine​(GameData p_GameData)
    GameEngine Constructor

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void addNewPlayer​(java.lang.String p_colour)
    add new player to the game
    void assignCountries()
    Randomly assign all the countries to the players.
    void gamePlayerCommand()
    Allows the user to create/remove the players for the game by typing command.
    java.lang.String getMapFilePath()
    Game Engine get correct map file path function, return map path
    void phaseProcess()
    this method is current player phase process, player's order will be processed here.
    void removePlayer​(Player p_Player)
    remove player from the game
    void showMap​(Player p_Player)
    this method used to player show map in game

    从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • d_GameData

      public GameData d_GameData
      the GameData you design from the MainLoop

  • 构造器详细资料

    • GameEngine

      public GameEngine​(GameData p_GameData)
      GameEngine Constructor
      参数:
      p_GameData - you should pass reference that Game Data you used

  • 方法详细资料

    • addNewPlayer

      public void addNewPlayer​(java.lang.String p_colour)
      add new player to the game
      参数:
      p_colour - you custom player color

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(Player p_Player)
      remove player from the game
      参数:
      p_Player - the player you want to remove

    • phaseProcess

      public void phaseProcess()
      this method is current player phase process, player's order will be processed here.

    • showMap

      public void showMap​(Player p_Player)
      this method used to player show map in game
      参数:
      p_Player - input the playerID you want to show its map

    • getMapFilePath

      public java.lang.String getMapFilePath() throws java.io.IOException
      Game Engine get correct map file path function, return map path
      返回:
      .map file relative file path
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if file not found

    • gamePlayerCommand

      public void gamePlayerCommand()
      Allows the user to create/remove the players for the game by typing command.

    • assignCountries

      public void assignCountries()
      Randomly assign all the countries to the players.
